fields.name: DependsOn
fields.description: Artifacts which need to be deployed before this resource group.

fields.name: Location
fields.description: Location of this resourceGroup. Leave empty if the resource group location will be specified during the blueprint assignment.

fields.name: Metadata
fields.description: User-friendly properties for this resource group.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of this resourceGroup. Leave empty if the resource group name will be specified during the blueprint assignment.

fields.name: Tags
fields.description: Tags to be assigned to this resource group.
